Xenus II - White Gold Installation Guide

1. Burn or Mount XenusIIWhiteGold ISO.
2. Install Xenus II - White Gold.
3. Copy & Paste Xenus II - White Gold Patch v1.01 content into Xenus II - White Gold directory.
4. Start Xenus II - White Gold Keygen, click "Get Num".
5. Start Xenus II - White Gold, paste [.Number.] code into where it prompts for Serial Key.
6. Select "Other" option to set up without internet connection.
7. Copy & Paste Hardware ID into the [.Hardware ID.] field in the Keygen.
8. Click "Get Key", Copy & Paste Serial Key from [.Key.] and put intoSerial Key destination.
9. Finished, have fun playing Xenus II - White Gold.

Notes: This is a Russian game, it has some stuff missing, and many sound affects will cut out after 10 - 20 minutes of play.
